fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
industry_forums:
The EU policies and proposals followed are in the following areas, directly relevant to our industry: 
- industry policy, (DG Grow – i.a. Cumulative Costs Assessments on the EU ceramics sector), 
- environment (REACH, CMD and others), 
- energy and climate policies (Clean Energy package, Energy Efficiency Directive, Emission Trading System), 
- construction policies (for example: Construction Products Regulation), etc.
eu_initiatives: Climate change, energy efficiency, renewable energy, Emissions Trading System, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Construction Products Regulation, Standardisation, Waste legislation, Industrial Emissions Directive, NEPSI, Research & Innovation, Circular Economy.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: TBE (Tiles and Bricks Europe), Cerame Unie
relevant_communication: National and regional activities within Climate change, energy efficiency, renewable energy, Emissions Trading System, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Construction Products Regulation, Standardisation, Waste legislation, Industrial Emissions Directive, NEPSI, Research & Innovation, Circular economy.
goals__remit:
DANSKE TEGL (Danish Brick and Roof Tile Association) is the  association for the Danish ceramic manufacturing industry, representing the common and collective interests of all sectors of the industry. Our member companies  include manufacturers from the following industry sub-sectors: 
 
Bricks 
Clay Roof Tiles 
Mortar
